articles.title: From ELIZA to ChatGPT, our digital reflections show the dangers of AI - Vox.com

articles.title: Fortnite is reportedly getting a first-person mode next season - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Fortnite’s first-person mode is likely coming to the game next season.
articles.content:
Fortnite‘s first-person mode is likely coming to the game next season.
That’s according to regular Fortnite leaker HypeX on Twitter who claims that the mode will be introduced during the next season… [+1358 chars]
